transcript: I get goosebumps even telling the story he said you know at the point in my career that I'm at now I can't really expect to learn a ton from courses that I don't already know and so what I've decided to do is I created a learning budget I allocate that to crazy ideas that I give myself complete permission to fail and what happens most times is they do nothing he said but every once in a while I have one that clicks and it takes off like crazy and I innovate the entire Marketplace again and so as soon as I got back I cranked all the ads to increase with this new investment amount built into it and we scaled like even crazier simply by reinvesting a percentage of what we make into crazy ideas
